cdesp: 无能力
edesp: No Ability

cdesp: 翻开：你在此处的其他牌-1力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards at this location with -1 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：加一张恶魔到你手牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a Demon to your hand.

cdesp: 持续：若你在此处有三张其他牌则+3力量。
edesp: Ongoing: If you have 3 other cards here, +3 Power.

cdesp: 此牌被摧毁时，力量翻倍并移回你手牌。
edesp: When this card is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the power.

cdesp: 翻开：随机摧毁一张对手在此处的1费牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy a random enemy 1-Cost card at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：若你下回合在此处出牌则+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：加一张1力量的松鼠到所有其他地点。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a 1-Power Squirrel to each other location.

cdesp: 每回合末，每剩一点能量则+1力量。
edesp: At the end of each turn, gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

cdesp: 翻开：随机加一张牌到你手牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

cdesp: 当你的一张牌被摧毁时，此牌从你牌库飞出替代它。
edesp: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your deck to replace it.

cdesp: 此牌移动时，力量翻倍。
edesp: When this moves, double its Power.

cdesp: 翻开：对手随机一张手牌+1费。（上限为6）
edesp: On Reveal: Give a random card in your opponent’s hand +1 Cost. (Maximum 6).

cdesp: 翻开：你打出的下张牌翻开后向左移动一个地点。
edesp: On Reveal: Move the next card you play one location to the left after it reveals.

cdesp: 翻开：塞一张岩石到对手牌库。
edesp: On Reveal: Shuffle a Rock into the opponent’s deck.

cdesp: 翻开：若对手本回合在此处出过牌，从其牌库抽一张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, draw a card from their deck.

cdesp: 无能力。
edesp: No Ability

cdesp: 你可移动此牌一次。
edesp: You can move this once.

cdesp: 此牌被摧毁时，你的所有牌+2力量。
edesp: When this is destroyed, give your other cards +2 Power.

cdesp: 总在你的起始手牌中。
edesp: Starts in your opening hand.

cdesp: 持续：不在你起始牌库的牌-1费。
edesp: Ongoing: Cards that didn’t start in your deck cost 1 less.

cdesp: 翻开：若对手本回合在此处出过牌则+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：将此处随机替换成一个新地点。
edesp: On Reveal: Replace this location with a random new one.

cdesp: 一旦此牌在你手牌，你就能查看未翻开的地点。
edesp: Once this is in your hand, you can see unrevealed locations.

cdesp: 翻开：移除对手的牌库顶牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Remove the top card of your opponent’s deck.

cdesp: 翻开：从你手牌随机弃一张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

cdesp: 翻开：移除你下张打出之牌的能力。
edesp: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.

cdesp:
第3回合后你无法打出此牌。
持续：你在此处无法出牌。
edesp: You can’t play this after turn 3. Ongoing: You can’t play cards here.

cdesp: 每回合末，若你在此处领先则抽一张牌。
edesp: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.

cdesp: 持续：本局游戏你每从你手牌弃掉一张牌则+2力量。
edesp: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card you discarded from your hand this game.

cdesp: 一张牌从你牌库之外进你手牌时，+2力量。
edesp: When a card enters your hand from anywhere (except your deck), +2 Power.

cdesp: 你在此处打出一张牌时，+2力量。
edesp: When you play a card here, +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：加一张寡妇之咬到对手收。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a Widow’s Bite to your opponent’s hand.

cdesp: 此牌被摧毁时，在原位召唤冬日战士。
edesp: When this is destroyed, create the Winter Soldier in its place.

cdesp: 此牌移动后，对手在新地点每有一张牌则+2力量。
edesp: When this moves to a location, +2 Power for each card your opponent has there.

cdesp: 翻开：你下张打出之牌+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：所有其他牌-1力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Give all other cards -1 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：你牌库中的所有牌+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：下回合你+1能量。
edesp: On Reveal: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

cdesp: 翻开：你在此处的所有其他牌移回你手牌，这些牌-1费。
edesp: On Reveal: Return your other cards at this location to your hand. They cost 1 less.

cdesp: 翻开：将对手牌库底牌放到你手牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Put the bottom card ofyour opponent’s deck into your hand.

cdesp: 翻开：消灭你在此处的所有其他牌，每消灭一张则+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

cdesp: 持续：双方无法在此处打出4、5或6费牌。
edesp: Ongoing: Nobody can play 4, 5 or 6-Cost cards at this location.

cdesp: 持续：你在此处打出的牌直到游戏结束才翻开。
edesp: Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.

cdesp: 你移动一张牌到此处时，此牌+1力量。
edesp: When you move a card here, this gets +1 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：若此牌在中间地点则+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：将与此牌相同力量的的惊恶克隆体加到此处。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a Sinister Clone to this location with the same Power.

cdesp: 持续：若双方在此处都有四张牌则+6力量。
edesp: Ongoing: If both players have 4 cards at this location, +6 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：若对手本回合在此处出过牌则+3力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +3 Power.

cdesp: 持续：在此处的牌无法被摧毁。
edesp: Ongoing: Cards at this location can’t be destroyed.

cdesp: 翻开：对手抽一张牌，该牌+1费。
edesp: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1

cdesp: 持续：无法被摧毁或移动。
edesp: Ongoing: Can’t be destroyed or moved.

cdesp: 你总在第2回合抽到此牌，不会提前抽到。
edesp: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

cdesp: 翻开：将你所有1费牌移回你手牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Return your 1-Cost cards to your hand.

cdesp: 此牌移动后，在原处留一个此牌的复制品。
edesp: When this moves, add a copy to the old location.

cdesp: 翻开：若此牌在中间地点则交换所有地点的位置。
edesp: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, swap the positions of each location.

cdesp: 翻开：加一张哨兵到你手牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Add another Sentinel to your hand.

cdesp: 无能力。
持续：若你手牌为空则+6力量。
edesp: Ongoing: If you hand is empty, +6 Power.

cdesp: 此牌从你手牌被弃时，加两张0费的复制品到你手牌。
edesp: When this is discarded from your hand, add two 0-Cost copies to your hand.

cdesp: 翻开：对手控制你在此地点的一张其他牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of one of your other cards at this location.

cdesp: 此牌被弃或消灭时，打出到随机地点。
edesp: When this card is discarded or destroyed, play it at a random location.

cdesp: 翻开：双方下回合可移动牌到此地点。
edesp: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

cdesp: 翻开：弃掉你手牌中最高费的一张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Discrard the highest-cost card from your hand.

cdesp: 持续：若对手在此地点有四张牌则-3力量。
edesp: Ongoing: -3 Power if your opponent has 4 cards here.

cdesp: 你打出此牌时，在所有其他地点打出幻影。此牌伪装成幻影直到游戏结束。
edesp: As you play this, play Illusions to other locations. Disguise this as an Illusion until the game ends.

cdesp: 翻开：从你手牌弃两张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand.

cdesp: 翻开：对手控制此牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

cdesp: 持续：你力量最高的牌+2力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Your highest power cards get +2 Power.

cdesp: 持续：你手牌每有一张牌则+2力量。
edesp: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.

cdesp: 翻开：你的三张其他牌+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Give 3 other cards +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：随机变为对手手牌中一张牌的复制品。
edesp: On Reveal: Become a copy of a random card in your opponent’s hand.

cdesp: 翻开：若你最后打出的牌有持续能力，则此牌获得该能力。
edesp: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an Ongoing ability, this card gains it.

cdesp: 翻开：从你手牌弃一张牌。随机摧毁对手的一张牌。
edesp: Discards a card from your hand. Destroy a random enemy card.

cdesp: 翻开：你手牌中的所有牌+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Give all cards in your hand +2 Power.

cdesp: 持续：你在此处且无能力的牌+2力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Your cards with no abilities have +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：随机从对手在此处的一张牌上偷取一个持续能力。
edesp: On Reveal: Steal an Ongoing ability from a random enemy card at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：摧毁你在此处的所有其他牌，将它们的力量加给此牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location. Add their Power to this card.

cdesp: 翻开：你在此处每有一张其他牌则+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

cdesp: 你打出一张牌时，此牌+1力量。
edesp: When you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：将两张与此牌力量相同的幼虫加到此处。
edesp: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings to this location with the same Power.

cdesp: 翻开：你力量最高的所有牌移到此处。
edesp: On Reveal: Move your highest power cards to this location.

cdesp:
翻开：+1能量上限。
持续：你每回合至多打出一张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: +1 Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

cdesp: 你在此处打出一张牌时，将它与你牌库中的一张牌交换。
edesp: When you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck.

cdesp: 持续：相邻地点+2力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Adjacent locations have +2 Power.

cdesp: 持续：对手在此处每有一张牌则+1力量。
edesp: Ongoing: +1 Power for every enemy at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：淹没此处。下回合之后不能在此处出牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

cdesp: 持续：你在此处的其他牌+1力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Your other cards at this location have +1 Power.

cdesp: 持续：此处的翻开能力无效。
edesp: Ongoing: On Reveal Abilities won’t happen at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：双方在所有其他地点各加一张岩石。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

cdesp: 翻开：将你弃掉的一张牌带到此处。
edesp: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards (to this location).

cdesp: 翻开：若对手本回合在此处出过牌则+3力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +3 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：若对手本回合在此处出过牌，随机移动这些牌。
edesp: On Reveal: If you opponent played cards here this turn, move them randomly.

cdesp: 翻开：摧毁所有1费牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy ALL 1-Cost cards.

cdesp: 翻开：复制你的手牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Duplicate your hand.

cdesp: 翻开：从双方手牌各一张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Discard a card from each player’s hand.

cdesp: 翻开：荒废此地点。（移除其能力）
edesp: On Reveal: Ruin this location. (remove its ability)

cdesp: 翻开：对手手牌中的所有牌-1力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent’s hand with -1 Power.

cdesp: 此牌移动后，+5力量。
edesp: When this card moves, +5 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：双方下回合手牌都为4费。
edesp: On Reveal: Next turn, cards in both players' hands cost 4.

cdesp: 无能力。
edesp: No Ability

cdesp: 翻开：将此牌随机合并到你在此处的一张牌下。
edesp: On Reveal: Merge this card with a random friendy card at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：摧毁下回合移动到此处的牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Next turn, destroy cards that move here.

cdesp: 此牌被摧毁时，将它移回你手牌并为0费。
edesp: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand. It costs 0.

cdesp: 翻开：从你手牌弃掉最低费的牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

cdesp: 翻开：摧毁你在此处的所有其他牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：移动对手的一个1或2费牌到此处。
edesp: On Reveal: Move an opposing 1 or 2-Cost card to this location.

cdesp: 回合结束时若此牌在你手牌，弃掉它。
edesp: If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it.

cdesp: 翻开：对手抽两张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

cdesp: 最后回合后，从你手牌弃一张牌，此牌获得所弃牌的力量。
edesp: After the final turn, discard a card from your hand. This has its Power.

cdesp: 持续：对手手牌中每有一张牌则+2力量。
edesp: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent’s hand.

cdesp: 翻开：打出你牌库顶牌到此处。
edesp: On Reveal: Play the top card of your deck at this location.

cdesp: 持续：双方每回合至多打出一张牌。
edesp: Ongoing: Players can only play 1 card a turn.

cdesp: 翻开：对手下回合不能在此处出牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Your opponent can’t play cards at this location next turn

cdesp: 持续：你在此处的翻开效果生效两次。
edesp: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities at this location happen twice.

cdesp: 翻开：摧毁对手在此处9+力量的所有牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy all enemy cards at this location that have 9 or more Power.

cdesp: 翻开：将你手牌洗回你牌库并抽三张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Shuffle your hand into your deck and draw 3 cards.

cdesp: 翻开：若对手本回合在此处出过牌则+4力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：移除在此处所有牌的持续能力。
edesp: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：交换你牌库中所有牌的力量和费用。
edesp: On Reveal: Swap the Power and Cost of all cards in your deck.

cdesp: 翻开：对手在此处的所有牌-1力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Inflict all enemy cards here with -1 Power.

cdesp: 持续：你的所有1费牌+1力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Your 1-Cost Cards have +1 Power.

cdesp: 持续：若你在此处只有此牌，+5力量。
edesp: Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.

cdesp: 持续：若你在此处领先至少10点，所有其他地点+4力量。
edesp: Ongoing: If you’re ahead by 10 power here, +4 power to other locations.

cdesp: 持续：若你在某地点没有牌，+4力量。
edesp: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +4 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：塞两张岩石到对手牌库。
edesp: On Reveal: Shuffle 2 useless Rocks into your opponent’s deck.

cdesp: 无能力。
翻开：将对手手牌中的一张6费牌复制到你手牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Draw a copy of a 6-Cost card in your opponent’s hand.

cdesp: 翻开：从你手牌弃一张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

cdesp: 你只能打出此牌到领先的地点。
edesp: You can only play this at locations where you have more Power than your opponent.

cdesp: 持续：你的所有其他牌-1力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Your other cards have -1 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：对手控制此牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

cdesp: 持续：你在此处的总力量加倍。
edesp: Ongoing: Your total Power is doubled at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：洞悉对手部署，然后重新开始本回合。（不能用康）
翻开：翻开：此牌的力量设为你最后打出之牌的力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Set this card’s Power equal to the Power of the last card you played.

cdesp: 翻开：随机在另一个地点加一张7力量的老虎。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a 7-Power Tiger to another location.

cdesp: 翻开：移除对手手牌中所有牌的能力。
edesp: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all cards in your opponent’s hand.

cdesp: 翻开：此地点变为凌波。
edesp: On Reveal: Change this location to ‘Limbo’.

cdesp: 持续：锁定此地点。（无法添加、移除或摧毁卡牌）
edesp: Ongoing: Lock down this location. (Cards can’t be added, removed or destroyed.)

cdesp: 持续：此牌右边的地点+5力量。
edesp: Ongoing: +5 Power at the location to the right.

cdesp: 翻开：若你下回合在此处出牌则+5力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +5 Power.

cdesp: 持续：你手牌中的所有牌-1费。（最低为1）
edesp: Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

cdesp: 翻开：将对手本回合打出的所有牌移到此地点。
edesp: On Reveal: Move all enemy cards played this turn to this location.

cdesp: 最终回合后，如可能则移动到某处致胜。
edesp: After the final turn, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)

cdesp: 翻开：若对手本回合在此处出过牌则+4力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：对手弃掉其手牌中最低费的一张牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Your opponent must discard the lowest-Cost card in their hand.

cdesp: 你每回合都能移动此牌。
edesp: You can move this each turn.

cdesp: 无能力。
edesp: No Ability

cdesp: 翻开：若你下回合不在此处出牌则+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: If you don’t play a card here next turn, +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：从对手手牌随机拉四张牌到此地点的对手一侧。
edesp: On Reveal: Pull 4 random cards from your opponent’s hand to their side of this location.

cdesp: 持续：对手在此地点的所有牌+2力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Enemy cards at this location have +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：随机摧毁你在此处的一张牌，在所有其他地点各加一张被摧毁牌的复制品。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy a random friendly card here; add copies of it to the other locations.

cdesp: 翻开：若你在此处只有此牌，摧毁所有其他地点。
edesp: On Reveal: If this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.

cdesp: 持续：你的所有其他牌+1力量。
edesp: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：复制对手本回合打出的所有牌，打出到你一侧。
edesp: On Reveal: Copy all cards your opponent played this turn, but on your side.

cdesp: 翻开：你具持续能力的所有牌+2力量。
edesp: On Reveal: Give your Ongoing cards +2 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：在所有其他地点各加一张5力量的末日机器人。
edesp: On Reveal: Add a 5-Power Doombot to each other location.

cdesp: 翻开：打出你从你手牌弃掉的所有牌，地点随机。
edesp: On Reveal: Play all cards you discraded from your hand to random locations.

cdesp: 持续：你在此处的所有其他持续效果翻倍。
edesp: Ongoing: Double your other Ongoing effects at this location.

cdesp: 翻开：在所有相邻地点召唤四个1力量的无人机。
edesp: On Reveal: Create four 1-Power Drones at each adjacent location.

cdesp: 你从你手牌弃掉此牌时，+4力量并放回。
edesp: When you discard this from your hand, put it back with +4 Power.

cdesp: 翻开：将你的所有其他牌向左移动一个地点。
edesp: On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.

cdesp: 翻开：触发你在此处所有其他牌的翻开效果。
edesp: On Reveal: Activate the On Reveal abilities of your other cards at this location.

cdesp: 游戏开始时，洗六个无限宝石到你牌库。
edesp: At the start of the game, shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

cdesp: 你总在第6回合抽到此牌，不会提前抽到。
edesp: You always draw this card on turn 6, and not before.

cdesp: 无能力。
翻开：将对手3和4费的所有牌移到此地点。
edesp: On Reveal: Move all opposing 3 and 4-Cost cards to this location.

cdesp: 阿加莎总在你的起始手牌中。她替你出牌。
edesp: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

cdesp: 翻开：摧毁你的所有其他牌。
edesp: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

cdesp: 你只能在在左侧地点打出此牌。
edesp: You can only play this at the left location.

cdesp: 若你上回合出过牌则无法打出此牌。
edesp: If you played a card last turn, you can’t play this.

cdesp: 本局游戏每有一张牌被摧毁则-1费。
edesp: Cost 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

cdesp: 未公布。
只要此牌在你手牌，你牌库中的牌无法被抽取。
edesp: While this is in your hand, cards in your deck cannot be drawn.

cdesp: 无能力。
翻开：从你牌库抽两张宝石。
翻开：将此地点替换成一个新地点。抽一张牌。

翻开：抽一张牌。
持续：对手在此处的所有牌-1力量。
翻开：你下回合可移动在此处的一张牌。抽一张牌。
翻开：抽一张牌。你下回合+1能量。
持续：若你已打出全部六个宝石，灭霸+10力量。（无论他在何处）
